title: What do i build in this situation?
body:
This isn't a rage post (although i am unimpressed) its a genuine 'what should i have done?' post.

I was vsing an almost all AD team, 

i had 325 armour, 4000 HP and a thornmail.

and the Yi just melted me instantly every single time.

so i want to know what i could have built/done instead to be the tank i was supposed to.
if that build didn't offer any resistance against him, what else should i have done?

replies.body: A full damage ad build, on any champion not just yi, will melt through a full tank build. Your job isn't to kill him 1v1 or sit there expecting to be invincible, its to be tanky enough that you can get your cc/peel off without instantly dying so that your teammates can kill the yi (which will be basically instantly if he is caught with any kind of cc and cant kill your teams damage champs first). If youre playing a tank and getting melted by the yi without someone else killing him first its because you're either out of position or your teams already died and you've lost the fight anyway

The Randuin's attack speed slow doesn't apply during Yi's ultimate, however Frozen hearts Aura attack speed slow does. But if he has an {{item:3031}} Randuins might be good with it.

If he is : {{item:3153}} {{item:1300}} {{item:3931}} {{item:3124}}  and 2 of one of these items: {{item:3053}} {{item:3748}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3812}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3139}} {{item:3033}} {{item:3036}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3074}} {{item:3143}} or skipped the Botrk and took 3 of those items you are basically doneso.

He has the highest DPS overall - in the end game, of anyone but Veigar or Nasus with massive stacks.

About all you can do is buy GA to stop the resets so he can be caught out or have enough lockdown but with the tankier Yi builds and his W then Q he can still shred teams and with the higher DPS teams can just instagib people before they can even land a CC. (R-E-Challenging smite, Q - flash Auto W animation cancel auto can delete an Annie and dodge an ulti and then he will be on the rest of you instantly.

The best thing to do is rush strong early game items, push hard, shut him down otherwise late game he is a monster only other hyper carries can usually compete with ({{champion:114}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:23}}  {{champion:38}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:33}} although some Champs can still help against him: {{champion:72}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:60}}.

More often than not, Dodging a death with Zhonya's can turn a fight around on him, or some strong CC but if he has a strong team comp and makes it to late game he's hard to deal with without certain Champs on your team (A lot of easy CC) or Hard CC and multiples at that. Plus a lot of burst or really good CC with strong chase and sustained damage to stop him engage and escaping then re-entering fights.

Riot nerfed Armor hard and he can get botrk and does heaps of magic damage with rageblade and devourer and deals true damage so hes stupidly OP IMO excluding his early game weakness. Verse people unprepared he is basically a free win if your team don't snowball and with a few kills he can even turn around that snowball on you.

{{item:3026}} GA is the best item against him for those being focused or caught as it shutsdown his resets, forces him to camp you till you respawn however if they have a strong team following up that's not always gonna help you win the game anyway and there's not much you can really do about it. Try split pushing, warding heaps and going for picks or trying to sneak objectives.
Bruisers are the most op class in the game. All you needed to do was stun the yi and nuke him. You can't 1v1 tank him.
{{item:3026}}  So they have to kill you twice ;-)

What tank items did you build exactly? Thornmail, Randuin's and Frozen Heart would've been great against Yi for the AS reduction and Crit reduction. You only need to live long enough to get your cc off so that your carries can melt him.

it will be great to get randuins and frozen heart against master yi, decreasing attack speed by 30% with both items. also, it will be great to use most of team's cc onto yi, since he is really weak against cc like ww ult, thresh q, etc. just ask team to focus yi and it won't be a problem.
who were you playing and did you have randuins? and what did the yi build? full build yi will usually melt anyone

Poppy, and i cant remember now but probably, 
we were both full build.

randuins would have def been a must vs yi, in a 1 on 1 situation i can see why a full build yi melted you, he melts just about everyone. although proper use of your E (when he medtates for example) an i dunno does her W knockdown during his Q? In a teamfight situation you should have just ulted him back to his base and dealt with the rest of his team then him.
